Room and space hire

These libraries offer room and space hire:

  • Aldeburgh Library
  • Beccles Library
  • Brandon Library
  • Broomhill Library
  • Bungay Community Library
  • Bury St Edmunds Library
  • Clare Library
  • Elmswell Library
  • Felixstowe Library
  • Framlingham Library
  • Gainsborough Community Library
  • Hadleigh Library
  • Halesworth Library
  • Haverhill Library
  • Ipswich County Library
  • Kedington Library
  • Kesgrave Library
  • Leiston Library
  • Lowestoft Library
  • Oulton Broad Library
  • Rosehill Library
  • Stowmarket Library
  • Sudbury Library
  • Woodbridge Library
